conbody.p: This document provides an overview of the GSM 6.10 Codec Implementation. It is aimed at device implementers who wish to write their own audio codec plugins.

section.title: Purpose
section.p: This library provides an implementation of a GSM 6.10 Codec.
The DLL that provides the functionality and the library to which your code must link is identified below.

entry.p: These files are used for implementing the GSM 6.10 Codec Implementation.

section.title: Architectural Relationship
section.p: This codec is a plugin built using the CMMFCodec MMF Server Base Class.

section.title: Description
section.p: The GSM 6.10 Codec Implementation provides a standard codec conversion between the GSM 6.10 and PCM16 data types.

section.title: Key GSM6.10 Codec Implementation Classes
section.p: GSM 6.10 Audio Codec Implementation provides the following classes:

li.p: CGsmTo16PcmWavCodec - converts GSM 6.10 audio data to 16 bit PCM.
C16PcmToGsmWavCodec - converts 16 bit PCM audio data to GSM 6.10.

section.title: Using the GSM6.10 Codec Implementation
section.p: The GSM 6.10 Audio Codec Implementation is used to:
